# ApplePayShippingMethodSelectedEvent

**Class**

An event object that contains the shipping method.

## Declaration

```swift
interface ApplePayShippingMethodSelectedEvent
```

## Overview

The event handler [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePaySession/onshippingmethodselected] receives this event object when the user selects a shipping method.

## Shipping method properties

- **shippingMethod**: The shipping method selected by the user.

## Handling shipping method updates

- **onshippingmethodselected**: An event handler to call when the user selects a shipping method.
- **completeShippingMethodSelection**: Completes the selection of a shipping method with an update.
- **ApplePayShippingMethodUpdate**: Updated transaction details that result from a change in shipping method.
